extra.name: The Ability to Imagine
extra.desc:
Artist: Peter Tilley

extra.name: ACT Memorial
extra.desc:
Artist: Matthew Harding

extra.name: Ainslie's Sheep
extra.desc:
Artist: Les Kossatz

extra.name: A is for Alexander B is for Bunyip C is for Canberra
extra.desc:
Artist: Anne Ross

extra.name: Alfred Deakin, A Life in Three Phases
extra.desc:
Artist: Martin Moore

extra.name: Aquila
extra.desc:
Artist: Phil Spelman

extra.name: A Short Walk
extra.desc:
Artist: Matthew Calvert

extra.desc:

extra.name: bush pack (nil tenure)

extra.desc:

Curtin and Chifley routinely walked along this route to the…view art»

extra.desc:
Artist: Lis Johnson

extra.desc:
Artist: David Tolley (1936-2014)

This sculpture is one of two works by David Tolley situated on Lake Burley Griffin. This work is in Weston Park, Yarralumla and the other is in Commonwealth Park, Parkes. It is made up from an arrangement of seven independent…view art»

extra.name: Flights of Fancy
extra.desc:
Artist: Matthew Harding, with Kate Ward

Flights of Fancy celebrates the array of native bird life that find habitat and breathe colour and character into the suburbs of Canberra, fostered by the bushland corridors that form part of the city’s unique planning.…view art»
